word: H995 - בִּין - bîyn - bene - Attend - கவனி

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - கவனி, அறிந்துகொள், சிந்தி, பகுத்தறி, உணர், புத்திமானாயிரு, விளங்கப்பண்ணு, மதி, விவேகியாயிரு, ஞானமாயிரு. காரிய சமர்த்தனமாயிரு
1) to discern, to understand, to consider
2) to understand, to know (with the mind)
3) to observe, to mark, to give heed to, to distinguish, to consider
4) to have discernment, insight, or understanding
b) (Niphal) to be discerning, to be intelligent, to be discreet, to have understanding
2) to cause to understand, to give understanding, to teach
d (Hithpolel) to show oneself discerning or attentive, to consider diligently

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to separate mentally (or distinguish), that is, (generally) understand: - attend, consider, be cunning, diligently, direct, discern, eloquent, feel, inform, instruct, have intelligence, know, look well to, mark, perceive, be prudent, regard, (can) skill (-ful), teach, think, (cause, make to, get, give, have) understand (-ing), view, (deal) wise (-ly, man).
Cognate: H1002, H1003, H1004, H1143, H2985, H4000, H8394, H946, H995, H996, H998
